title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Identify the functional and non-functional requirements of the Distributed Natural Language Processing Engine, including scalability, concurrency, fault tolerance, integration with existing systems, and performance benchmarks.

title: Design Architecture for Distributed System
description: Define the system architecture and components required for a scalable distributed natural language processing engine.

title: Implement Backend Components (RFC-7185)
description: Develop the backend components for natural language processing, text analytics, and language model training. This includes the development of APIs, data handling, and integration with other system components.

title: Develop Frontend Interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for interacting with the distributed natural language processing engine. The interface should include functionality for inputting text, monitoring the processing status, and viewing the results.

title: Database Design and Integration
description: Design a scalable, fault-tolerant database schema for the distributed natural language processing engine. This should include performance optimizations for large-scale text analytics, error handling strategies, and ensure compatibility with other components of the system. Integrate this design with the existing architecture. Upon completion, provide a detailed documentation on the database design and its integration process.

title: DevOps Configuration and Deployment
description: Set up CI/CD pipelines, configure the system for scalability, and deploy the distributed natural language processing engine in a production environment. This task also includes documentation of the deployment process.

title: Unit Testing
description: Write unit tests for the various components of the distributed natural language processing engine.

title: System Integration Testing
description: Perform system integration testing to ensure the different components of the engine work together correctly.

title: Security Review and Implementation
description: Conduct a security review of the distributed natural language processing engine, identify any vulnerabilities, and implement necessary security measures.

title: Documentation and Technical Writing
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the distributed natural language processing engine, including user guides, API references, and development guidelines.
